topic.title: Lyric Theatre
topic.shortdesc: This portion will be displaying background information and features of the Lyric Theater in Blacksburg.

image.alt: Image of the entrance of Lyric Theatre

section.title: Context
section.p: Initially founded in 1930 as a Movie House, The Lyric Theatre has served for a non-for-profit theatre for movie screenings, indie films, and live performances since 1998. It has a seating capacity of 477 and is currently located at 135 College Ave, Blacksburg, VA 24060.
